claim: Flublok contains 3x the hemagglutinin (HA) antigen content of standard-dose flu vaccines, which has been linked to greater immunogenicity vs standard-dose flu vaccines.

extracted_evidence.quote: RIV4 (recombinant HA vaccine) contains 45 µg of HA per 0.5 mL dose, which is 3 times the HA antigen content of standard-dose inactivated influenza vaccines (15 µg per 0.5 mL dose). Increased HA antigen content has been associated with greater immunogenicity compared with standard-dose vaccines.
extracted_evidence.relevance_explanation: This quote explicitly states that RIV4 (Flublok) contains 3 times the HA antigen content of standard-dose flu vaccines and directly links the increased HA content to greater immunogenicity, supporting both parts of the claim.
